definitions: the action of mentioning or alluding to something

examples.text: he made reference to the enormous power of the mass media

short_definitions: action of mentioning or alluding to something

definitions: a mention or citation of a source of information in a book or article

examples.text: each chapter should have references to books covering the subject in greater depth

short_definitions: mention or citation of source of information in book or article

definitions: a source of information cited in a book or article.
short_definitions: source of information cited in book or article

definitions: the use of a source of information in order to ascertain something
the sending of a matter to an authority for decision or consideration

examples.text: the publishers reprinted and sold the work without reference to the author

short_definitions: sending of matter to authority for decision or consideration

definitions: a letter from a previous employer testifying to someone's ability or reliability, used when applying for a new job

examples.text: I was dismissed from the library, but with a good reference

short_definitions: letter from previous employer testifying to someone's ability or reliability

definitions: a person who agrees to testify to someone's ability or reliability when they apply for a new job.
provide (a book or article) with citations of sources of information

examples.text: each chapter is referenced, citing literature up to 1990

short_definitions: provide book or article with citations of sources of information

examples.text: the media referenced our association in almost 40 articles
